pageProduct.name: Swisse Skincare Bamboo Skin Refining Exfoliator 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

With Bamboo Stem Powder and Rice Bran Water

Swisse Bamboo Skin Refining Exfoliator is a gentle facial exfoliant formulated with Bamboo Stem Powder to help polish and remove dead skin cells, and Rice Bran Water to hydrate the skin, for a soft and smooth complexion.

Suitable For: Oily or combination skin

Size: 125mL

Warnings

Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water
Glycerin (Plant Derived)
Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran
Bambusa Arundinacea (Bamboo) Stem Powder
Zea Mays (Corn) Starch
Coco-Glucoside
Xanthan Gum
Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder
Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
Hamamelis Virginiana Flower Water (Witch Hazel)
Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/Leaf Extract (Bilberry)
Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract
Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract
Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract
Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract
Punica Granatum Fruit Extract (Pomergranate)
Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Seed Extract
Silybum Marianum Extract
Commiphora Myrrha Oil
Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil
Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil
Fusanus Spicatus Wood Oil
Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract
Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil
Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil
Citric Acid
Cocamidopropyl Betaine
Dehydroacetic Acid
Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Gently massage a small amount into wet skin in a circular motion, rinse well with warm water.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 28°C.
